translation.title: Url shortener
translation.description: Enter the URL in the field below. By clicking on the button you will get the shorten URL.

alert.error: An error occured. Please try again later.
alert.success: Shortened URL has been copied to clipboard!

error.invalid-format: Please enter an url with the right format

error404.title: Error 404
error404.description: The page you trying to reach does not exist

error500.title: Error 500
error500.description: An error occured. Please try again later.

redirection.title: You will be redirect to your page in 2 seconds
